photo.title: entrada al pukara de quitor

photo.description: The ruins of Pukará de Quitor, a 12th Century fortress overlooking the San Pedro River valley where indigenous forces attempted to hold off conquistador Pedro de Valdivia and the Spanish in the 1540’s. On Google Earth: Pukará de Quitor 22°53'28.34"S, 68°12'53.45"W
photo.title: 20120617_Chile_3491 San Pedro de Atacama

photo.description: The ruins of Pukará de Quitor, a 12th Century fortress overlooking the San Pedro River valley where indigenous forces attempted to hold off conquistador Pedro de Valdivia and the Spanish in the 1540’s. On Google Earth: Pukará de Quitor 22°53'28.34"S, 68°12'53.45"W
photo.title: 20120617_Chile_3497 San Pedro de Atacama

photo.description: Pukara de Quitor - fortaleza inca e lickan antay. Indiana Jones style.
photo.tags: atacama chile deserto desert altiplano inca pukara quitor me trekking hikking sports viagem travel
photo.title: Atacama

photo.description: Rio San Pedro, seen from the Pukará de Quitor (Quechua fortress of Quitor). San Pedro de Atacama, Chile.
photo.tags: atacama desert sanpedrodeatacama atacamadesert landscape
photo.title: The river runs red

photo.description: A matching archway frames the high lookout and monument that was our destination on top of Quitor Hill. Pukara de Quitor, San Pedro de Atacama, Chile
photo.tags: atacama desert sanpedrodeatacama atacamadesert landscape
photo.title: A framed destination

photo.description: Getting geeky over the geology again, as this great erosion pattern reveals the tectonic forces that shaped the desert. Pukara de Quitor, San Pedro de Atacama, Chile
photo.tags: atacama desert sanpedrodeatacama atacamadesert landscape
photo.title: The serrated desert

photo.description: Water and wind erosion reveal a 90o tilt in the desert sediments where tectonic forces have pushed up the Andes. Pukara de Quitor, San Pedro de Atacama, Chile.
photo.tags: atacama desert sanpedrodeatacama atacamadesert landscape
photo.title: A geologist's dream

photo.description: On the walk up to the lookout on Quitor Hill this stone archway nicely frames the desert volcano view. Pukara de Quitor, San Pedro de Atacama, Chile.
photo.tags: atacama desert sanpedrodeatacama atacamadesert landscape
photo.title: Framing the view

photo.description: The view from the lookout on the top of Quitor Hill, across the outer reaches of San Pedro de Atacama to the desert plains and highlands beyond. Pukara de Quitor, San Pedro de Atacama, Chile.
photo.tags: atacama desert sanpedrodeatacama atacamadesert landscape
photo.title: San Pedro View

photo.title: The hillside ruins of the Pukara de Quitor

photo.description: Quando a gente começou a subir a Pukara de Quitor, este cachorro começou a nos seguir. Quando a gente parava, ele parava. Quando nosso grupo se dividia, ele ficava olhando de um lado para o outro, sem saber para onde ir, e, ao mesmo tempo, tentava indicar o caminho que a gente devia seguir. Muito simpático. This dog followed us all around Pukara de Quitor. Waiting for us, when we stoped. A very nice dog.
photo.tags: sanpedrodeatacama chile atacama desert deserto cachorro dog língua tongue
photo.title: Cachorrinho / Little dog

photo.description: Indo para o Pukara de Quitor, saindo de San Pedro de Atacama. Going to Pukara de Quitor from San Pedro de Atacama.
